column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////This is definitely my favorite spot to get ramen in Houston. It's probably the best ramen I've ever had. I always get the Spicy Chicken Ramen and it never disappoints. The ramen usually comes out very hot
column2: which I like (I've been to a place where it was warm and I wasn't happy lol). I usually add Chicken Soboro (ground chicken) to my ramen and it gives it more flavor. The flavor of the chicken broth is great
column3: and the level of spicy isn't unbearable (I usually like mine really spicy so I always add extra hot sauce). The chicken is always tender and succulent
column4: and they give you a nice amount.
